data.title: Charles Gutteridge of Hathern 1801
data.meta_description:
I believe Charles Gutteridge of Hathern to be my g.g.grandfather. 
From IGI I can locate his baptism as 5th Nov 1801, Hathern, the son of John Gutteridge and Sarah. He married Rebecca Brookes of Hathern in Loughborough on 2 May 1830. They had 3 children, Henry 1831, John 1835 (my g.grandfather) and Rowland (who died in infancy). It appears that Rebecca died sometime before the 1861 census as Charles is recorded in 1861 as Widower, age 58 lodging with Richard Barton of Nottingham Road,
data.text:
I believe Charles Gutteridge of Hathern to be my g.g.grandfather.

From IGI I can locate his baptism as 5th Nov 1801, Hathern, the son of John Gutteridge and Sarah. He married Rebecca Brookes of Hathern in Loughborough on 2 May 1830. They had 3 children, Henry 1831, John 1835 (my g.grandfather) and Rowland (who died in infancy). It appears that Rebecca died sometime before the 1861 census as Charles is recorded in 1861 as Widower, age 58 lodging with Richard Barton of Nottingham Road, Loughborough. He is later recorded in the 1881 census as lodging with Mary Armstrong in Dovecot Street, Hathern. He is still widowerer and appears to have moved back to his town of birth. Also lodging at that address was Charles Hickingbottom (born abt 1841 Hathern). That same Charles Hickingbottom was informant at the registration of Charles Gutteridge's death on 29th Sep 1881.

Two requests:

1. Could sks with access to Leicestershire 1841 or 1851 census please let me know what we learn about the family at those dates?

2. Is there anyone who can establish something more about Charles parents, John Gutteridge and Sarah. Where and when were they born, where did they marry?

Perhaps someone can help me get back before Charles Gutteridge to John or earlier.

Hello, Looking on LDS for a marriage between John and Sarah in the period 1780 to 1800 in Leicester I could only see 1 possibility.

John Guttridge

Ch: 27 JAN 1754 Walton On The Wolds, Leicester

Father: Samuel Guttridge

Mother: Ann Taylor

Spouse: Sarah Lines

Marriage: 21 JAN 1781

Source Information:

Film Number: 457931

...........................

*if this is the right family these are John's siblings all born Walton On The Wolds to Samuel & Ann.

1. Samuel Guttridge 27 AUG 1749

2. Thomas Guttridge 04 JUN 1751

3. John Guttridge 27 JAN 1754

4. William Guttridge 14 MAR 1756

5. Elizabeth Guttridge 05 JAN 1761

6. Daniel Guttridge 01 JAN 1764

7. Joseph Guttridge 12 JUN 1768

8. Mary Guttridge 25 FEB 1759

..............................

*and Samuel & Ann's marriage.

SAMUEL GUTTRIDGE

Spouse: ANNE TAYLOR

M: 13 NOV 1748 Walton On The Wolds, Leicester

Source Information:

Batch Number: 7020413

Sheet: 57

Source Call No.: 0538495 Type: Film

.................................

Goog luck with your search.

Kind Regards

Peter Euston
